name: Summer House Brisbane
description:
Welcome to Summer House Brisbane
Come and immerse yourself in the heart of Brisbane’s backpacking hub and make Summer House Brisbane your home away from home!

Central Location
Perfectly situated in the heart of Brisbane, Summer House Hostel is just 20 minutes from the airport by car or train and only a 10-minute walk from the Brisbane Transit Centre. With easy access to the Brisbane CBD, South Bank, and Suncorp Stadium, you’ll be right in the action. Popular attractions such as the Brisbane River, Queen Street Mall, and Roma Street Parklands are all within walking distance. With cafés, restaurants, shops, and nightlife nearby, everything you need is at your doorstep.

Features & Facilities
Whether you’re here to explore or unwind, we’ve got you covered:

- A stunning rooftop terrace with city views
- A cozy TV room with Netflix for chilled nights in
- Fully equipped kitchen and dining areas for home-cooked meals
- Modern, spacious rooms with curtained beds and storage lockers
- On-site laundry facilities for your convenience

Community Vibes & Daily Events
We host free daily events to help you meet fellow travelers, including our famous Friday BBQ and Sunday morning pancakes. Plus, our travel desk is ready to help you plan unforgettable tours and adventures around Brisbane and beyond.

Additional Perks
- Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hostel
- Free SIM cards on arrival
- Free coffee & tea available all day
- Reception open daily from 8 AM – 10 PM, with a night manager on duty until 5 AM for late check-ins
- Secure access to ensure peace of mind

Check-In & Check-Out
Check-in: From 2 PM
Check-out: By 10 AM

Booking & Payment Policies

- Non-refundable bookings: Full payment will be charged before arrival to secure your stay.
- Pay-on-arrival bookings: The first night will be charged 24 hours before arrival, with the balance payable at check-in.
- We accept Visa, MasterCard, and cash (AMEX not accepted). A 1.9% surcharge applies to card payments.
- A valid passport is required at check-in. Please note: failure to present a passport may result in cancellation of your booking.
- A refundable $20 key deposit is collected at check-in.
- Guests must be between 18 and 35 years old to stay.
- Please note: we are unable to accept group bookings larger than 8 guests.

Cancellation Policy

Cancellations made within 24 hours of arrival, or no-shows, will incur a charge equivalent to one night’s stay per person.
Booking changes must be requested at least 24 hours prior to check-in and are subject to availability.

houseRules.notes:
PLEASE NOTE:
Guest will be able to check-in during Front Desk opening hours from 14.00 to 22.00, after reception trading hours the night manager on duty will check guests in until 5am, please call the number displayed on the front entrance. 

* Only accept guests over 18 until 35 years  old presenting a valid ID or passport
* Cash payments not accepted after 10pm
* $20 Key deposit upon checking in
* No outside guests allowed
* 1.9% surcharge on all card payments (No Amex accepted)

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
